sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; const WeatherCard = ({newWeatherInfo}) => { const {temp, temp_min, temp_max, description, speed, place} = newWeatherInfo; return ( <>

Current Date

 {new Date().toLocaleString()}

Current Place

 {place}

Current Temp.

 {temp}°C

MinTemp

 {temp_min}°C

MaxTemp

 {temp_max}°C

WindSpeed

 {speed}

Description

 {description}
{/*
NewCases
TotalCases
Recovered
TotalDeath
Traffic
*/}
) } export default WeatherCard;
